name: Therme Zen white lotus shower satin
composition: INGREDIENTS: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, PARFUM, DISODIUM LAURETH SULFOSUCCINATE, GLYCERYL OLEATE, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, GLYCERIN, NELUMBO NUCIFERA FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES CITRATE, GLYCINE, SODIUM FERROCYANIDE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, TETRASODIUM IMINODISUCCINATE, CITRIC ACID.
